{{Infobox Berry |name = #50 Colbur |image = [[File:Colbur.png]] |caption = Tiny hooks grow on the surface of this Berry. It latches on to Pok√©mon so it can be carried to far-off places. It has a tendency to overtake nearby plants. |growtime = 7h 30m 0s |harvest = 35 berries |replant = 5% |points = 2300 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *20 sour }} == Description == '''Colbur''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rabuta]], at least 1 [[Kasib]] and at least 1 [[Payapa]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 48 mins || 2 hours 48 mins || 5 hours 24 mins || 7 hours 30 mins - 15 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ColburTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ColburTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ColburTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 7 hours 30 mins -
15 hours || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 5 hours -
10 hours || 60 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 3 hours 20 mins -
6 hours 40 mins || 40 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Colbur berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] |- | [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || || [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] || || || [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] |- | [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || || [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Payapa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Rabuta]] || 3 hours 24 mins until ripe || 2 hours 16 mins until ripe || 1 hour 30 mins 40 secs |- | [[Kasib]] || 5 mins until ripe || 3 mins 20 secs until ripe || 2 mins 13 secs |} === Important Notes === [[Kasib]] berries will speed up the wither rates of all [[Rabuta]] and [[Payapa]] berries on the farm. The amount of time that Boost Mulch and the Sprayduck are active on the former two berries should be minimized to prevent excessive withering by the Kasib berry. However, the long wither times of both Rabuta and Payapa should prevent this potential Kasib withering increase from being an issue. {{Berries}}
